import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useQuery } from "@apollo/client"; import { QUERY_CATEGORIES } from "../utils/queries"; import { QUERY_USER } from "../utils/queries"; function DashBoard() { const { data } = useQuery(QUERY_USER); let user; if (data) { user = data.user; console.log(user); } return ( <>
← Back to Products {user ? ( <>

); } export default DashBoard;
